* define read_17. * READ TABLE result-t_dd17v ASSIGNING <17> * WITH KEY sqltab = name * indexname = <i>-index_name * fieldname = <f>-column_name. * IF sy-subrc = 0. * CLEAR <17>. * ENDIF. * end-of-DEFINITION.

l_name = name. s_stats = o_obj_stats->get_table_stats( l_name ).
LOOP AT s_stats-indexes ASSIGNING <i>. LOOP AT <i>-columns ASSIGNING <f> WHERE num_distinct <= 1. * Remove field with unique values => because useless * Act as they do not exists for indexes check READ TABLE result-t_dd17v ASSIGNING <17> WITH KEY sqltab = name indexname = <i>-index_name fieldname = <f>-column_name.
